name: Design File Template
description:
https://gum.co/vAPHe


In order to speed up our workflow, standardise our design approach and better communicate complicated designs to engineering, marketing and business, we've developed this design template.


Whether you want to browse it for inspiration or include it in your workflow, give this one a try!


The design file includes tools for every step of the creative process (empathise, design, make, ship) and lots of additional nuggets like a project slide deck and unique assets.
